original_text:
They have sunk deep into corruption,
    as in the days of Gibeah.
God will remember their wickedness
    and punish them for their sins.
korean_text: 그들은 기브아의 시대와 같이 심히 부패한지라 여호와께서 그 악을 기억하시고 그 죄를 벌하시리라

sentences.original_text: They have sunk deep into corruption,
as in the days of Gibeah.
and punish them for their sins.
